pageContent: Background: We evaluated clinical outcomes of region target focal therapy with high-intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) for the localized prostate cancer (PCa) based on magnetic resonance imaging-based biopsy and systematic prostate biopsy for Asian.

metaData.source:
The impact of obesity on the diagnosis of prostate cancer using a modern extended biopsy scheme
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/19084847/
